name: A Sunday in the Park
description:
A Sunday in the Park is a short text adventure game I created for a class learning Unity. It's pretty simple, but let me know if you find any bugs or have suggestions. Currently, the game is only playable on desktop.

Controls: Press 1, 2, or 3 when prompted to make choices.

There are 6 endings and 3 game overs if you'd like to go back and find all there is to see.

Hope you enjoy!
